Description: Two joined fragments of the neck of a black figure painted pottery situla. Bird standing, incised rosette in field. Purple for alternate feathers and alternate petals of rosette.
Curator's comments: The detail near the right bottom corner cannot be confidently explained.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 9 (and Pl. GB 597, 1)) (Group C21)
Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxvi, 2)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 261)
